outline:
1. to wash (by treading), be washed, perform the work of a fuller
    1. (Qal) washer, fuller, treader (participle)
    2. (Piel) to wash (garments, person)
    3. (Pual) to be washed
    4. (Hothpael) to be washed out
strongs_def: to trample; hence, to wash (properly, by stamping with the feet), whether literal (including the fulling process) or figurative
